Subject: Device showing offline
Description:
Hello Team,

There are so many clients are showing offline on my cloud server. I need to check why it is showing offline. Can anyone help me to resolved this ASAP?
What_We_Know__c:
In our call we discovered that the renewal license was not applied to your Endpoint Protector Server.

The customer also asked about endpoint licenses that remained assigned after the computer "hostnames" were renamed, we showed our customer how to use the "Automatic Release License" feature and how to release licenses.
Next_Steps__c: We shared again the renewal license file with the customer to import into their Endpoint Protector Server.  The customer confirmed that the issue is now resolved and requested that support ticket be closed.
Solution_Comment__c: We shared again the renewal license file with the customer to import into their Endpoint Protector Server.  The customer confirmed that the issue is now resolved and requested that support ticket be closed.
